Featured-image: C223-lavender-cutaway-shoulder-evening-dress-with-sheer-panel_p.jpg

----

Description: This evening dress features sheer panel at center of the bust with sequins and jewels detail the neckline and the waistline. The back of the bodice is sheer with small panels of color and lined with the sequins. The form fitting skirt falls to the floor with a sweeping train.
